Packages 
Package Description
infodynamics.measures.continuous
This package contains Java Interfaces for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to continuous data (ie double[] or double[][] data), as well as some base classes for implementations to build on.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which assume the data is Gaussian with linear relationships.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use box-kernel estimation.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kozachenko
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use the Kozachenko-Leonenko method.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use the Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) method.
infodynamics.measures.continuous.symbolic
This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use permutation entropy or symbolic methods.
infodynamics.measures.discrete
This package contains Java classes for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to discrete data (ie int[] or int[][] data).
infodynamics.measures.mixed
This package contains Java Interfaces for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to mixed continuous-discrete data (ie double[] or double[][] data mixed with int[] or int[][] data).
infodynamics.measures.mixed.gaussian  
infodynamics.measures.mixed.kernel  
infodynamics.measures.mixed.kraskov  
infodynamics.measures.mixed.symbolic  
infodynamics.measures.spiking  
infodynamics.measures.spiking.integration  
infodynamics.networkinference.interregional
This package contains classes for effective connectivity analysis at a regional level.
infodynamics.utils
This package contains utility classes to support the calculators in other packages
